named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdges
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e where e.removed = false AND ( e.incomingVertex.removed = false AND e.outgoingVertex.removed = false)

named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgesByKey
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e join e.propMap m where e.removed = false AND (m.keyName = :keyName AND e.incomingVertex.removed = false AND e.outgoingVertex.removed = false)

named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgeById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e where e.id = :id AND e.removed = false

named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgesByLabel
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e where e.label = :label AND e.removed = false
